ComicInfo.Title: Crisis on Infinite Tick Spin-Offs Part 1: A Heroic Fist-O-Thon
ComicInfo.Summary: Crisis on Infinite Tick Spin-Offs Part 1: A Heroic Fist-O-Thon: The Tick is visiting Japan to see monsters and he is in luck as Gomorra attacks. Paul is about to be killed by Sagin, but he is in luck because Gomorra attacks. Captain Academia and Hollowpoint are visiting from The City in order to help the Japanese government. The Tick meets up with Paul and has a conversation with his dead grandfather and a drink with his mother. Then the duo run across Academia and Hollowpoint and beat on them. They decide to team up to face Gomorra. But Sagin is the real villain behind the scenes as he uses the distractions facing our heroes to teleport to The City.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-23 22:36:16. [CVDB120138] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 02:26:44. [Issue ID 259695]
